channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Will Smith drives in run, extending Dodgers' lead over Blue Jays
item.description: Will Smith drove in run, extending the Los Angeles Dodgers' lead over the Toronto Blue Jays.

item.title: NBA Commissioner 'Deeply Disturbed' By Gambling Arrests of Billups, Rozier
item.description: NBA Commissioner Adam Silver has expressed shock over the arrests of Chauncey Billups and Terry Rozier on gambling-related charges.

item.title: Blue Jays' Daulton Varsho crushes a two-run homer to tie game at 2-2 against Dodgers
item.description: Toronto Blue Jaysâ€™ Daulton Varsho crushed a two-run homer that tied the game against the Los Angeles Dodgers

item.title: Addison Barger CRUSHES A GRAND SLAM to put Blue Jays up 9-2 over Dodgers in Game 1 of World Series
item.description: Addison Barger crushed a grand slam that gave the Toronto Blue Jays a 9-2 lead over the Los Angeles Dodgers in Game 1 of the World Series.

item.title: NFL Reminds Players of League Gambling Policy In Light of Federal Indictments
item.description: The NFL is reminding its players of the league's gambling policy in wake of the bombshell NBA betting investigation.

item.title: Follow live: Shohei Ohtani homers, but Blue Jays still in control in Game 1
item.description: It's the defending champion Dodgers against the underdog Blue Jays. We've got all the action covered.

item.title: Round 1 preview, predictions: Can anyone stop Philly?
item.description: Now that the Wild Card games are over with, the MLS postseason moves into the best-of-three Round 1.

item.title: NBA gambling investigation live updates: Latest arrests, statements, more
item.description: Trail Blazers coach Chauncey Billups, Heat guard Terry Rozier and former Cavs player Damon Jones have been arrested in connection with the probes.

item.title: C's Brown: NBA not shielding players over betting
item.description: Celtics forward and NBPA vice president Jaylen Brown said the NBA isn't doing enough to help players around sports betting issues in the sport.

item.title: Shock USWNT loss shows lack of problem-solving, but no cause for alarm (yet)
item.description: The surprising loss to Portugal by the U.S. women's national team came from players who admit they were "on islands" and "trying to fix it on their ow...
